Package org.keycloak.protocol.oidc.grants

Class JWTAuthorizationGrantValidator

java.lang.Object
org.keycloak.authentication.authenticators.client.AbstractBaseJWTValidator
org.keycloak.protocol.oidc.grants.JWTAuthorizationGrantValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
JWTAuthorizationGrantValidationContext
public class JWTAuthorizationGrantValidator extends AbstractBaseJWTValidator implements JWTAuthorizationGrantValidationContext
Validator for JWT Authorization grant that extends AbstractBaseJWTValidator and implements the JWTAuthorizationGrantValidationContext interface.
Author:
rmartinc
